body:
Comment 1: 
I cannot reproduce this on OS X with GOOS=darwin, GOARCH=amd64 and the tip of the source
tree; the 
output appears to identical matrices.

Can you please try with the latest source tree, and verify that the bug is still present
(and if possible, if it is 
present with GOARCH 386 and amd64)?

Also, since you are familiar with the code, you should be able to simplify your code
significantly. This will help 
us debugging this much more quickly. Thanks.
- gri
_Owner changed to **g...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
